Name: Vault City
About the game: The world is destroyed. You are in charge of the survivors. You are from Vault AX-11. It's now called Vault City. The city has certain needs. You build these needs while trying to keep the colonists alive. You don't build the city itself. You help with its development. Fix the power plant type tasks. Build farms. Build a hospital. and more.. Alpha version for now. One level full of fun. - provision of water and basic food - basic construction of the house and accessories - six content quests - 5 basic types of enemies - influence of radiation, sleep, luck, energy, hunger, thirst - basic events -basic weapons and armor -possibility to trade - night and day It will definitely take a few hours of fun. Future changes and ideas - better GUI graphics - better animations - more levels - plague of elements - more enemies - more item crafting options - greater possibility of construction - more quests and open world - influencing the level based on the completion of quests and more
